title: Ethereumâ€™s new two-tiered staking solution: A game changer for security and scalability
description: In a significant move aimed at improving the security, efficiency, and scalability of the Ethereum network, the platform has recently shifted from its traditional Proof-of-Work (PoW) consensus mechanism to a Proof-of-Stake (PoS) system. This transition is seen as a crucial step in addressing some of the challenges and limitations that have plagued the staking process ... Read more

title: Trader Who Called 2022 Crypto Bottom Flips Bullish on Bitcoin, Says BTC Bears Clinging To Last Line of Defense
description:
A top trader who nailed the bottom of last year’s bear market believes that Bitcoin (BTC) is one resistance level away from igniting a big burst to the upside. Pseudonymous analyst DonAlt tells his 508,100 followers on the social media platform X that he thinks Bitcoin has a solid chance to rally as it threatens […]
